title: Strength Training
shortDesc: Build muscle and increase overall strength with structured weight training.
fullDesc: This program focuses on compound lifts, progressive overload, and proper technique to build strength safely and effectively.

title: Weight Loss Program
shortDesc: Burn fat effectively through cardio, HIIT, and guided workouts.
fullDesc: Designed to support fat loss using a mix of cardio, high-intensity workouts, and structured routines for consistent results.

title: Personal Training
shortDesc: One-on-one training sessions focused on personal fitness goals.
fullDesc: Personalized training sessions with dedicated trainer attention, tailored workouts, and focused progress tracking.

title: Functional Training
shortDesc: Improve mobility, balance, and real-life strength.
fullDesc: Functional movements designed to enhance daily performance, coordination, flexibility, and overall strength.

title: Cardio & HIIT
shortDesc: High-intensity workouts designed to boost stamina and burn calories.
fullDesc: Fast-paced sessions combining cardio and HIIT techniques to maximize calorie burn and cardiovascular health.

title: Body Transformation
shortDesc: Complete physique transformation with guided training.
fullDesc: A comprehensive program combining strength training, conditioning, and lifestyle guidance for visible results.
